bill.summary:
Allied Burden Sharing Report Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Defense to submit an annual report to Congress describing:
each allied nation's annual defense spending, its contributions to military or stability operations in which the United States participates, and limitations it places on such contributions' use; and actions taken by the United States or by other countries to minimize such limitations.
